meanings.definition: The process of removing oxygen from a substance or environment.
meanings.sent1: During the deoxygenation of the water, all the bubbles disappeared.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the deoxygenation of the air in the closed chamber.
meanings.sent3: The deoxygenation of the room made it hard for the plants to grow.
meanings.sent4: The deoxygenation of the lake turned it into a lifeless pool.
meanings.sent5: The deoxygenation of the tank caused the fish to struggle for breath.

meanings.definition: The act of reducing the amount of oxygen in a system.
meanings.sent1: The deoxygenation of the atmosphere was a concern for the divers.
meanings.sent2: The deoxygenation of the blood can lead to serious health issues.
meanings.sent3: The deoxygenation of the room made everyone feel sleepy.
meanings.sent4: The deoxygenation of the balloon caused it to slowly deflate.
meanings.sent5: The deoxygenation of the tank resulted in the fish gasping for air.
